text: Tough Nut () is a 1967 Soviet comedy movie directed by Theodor Vulfovich.КРЕПКИЙ ОРЕШЕК (1967)Крепкий орешек It stars Nadezhda Rumyantseva, Vitaly Solomin, and Vladimir Lippart. ==Actors== *Nadezhda Rumyantseva - Raya Oreshkina *Vitaly Solomin - Lieutenant Ivan Rodionovich Groznykh *Vladimir Lippart - Sergeant Schepetnikov *Valentin Abramov - staff captain *Yuri Sorokin - SS Obersturmfuhrer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1967 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Tough Nut (movie)
